content: chain 2 sl in the chain space chain 2 sl in the same stitch as the sl of the previous round over the sl of the last row * repeat between ** all the way to the bottom end off finishing now we ll add the bead and create the hanging loop thread the starting color a tail onto the tapestry needle take a stitch to make sure the yarn is coming up through the center of the magic loop thread the bead onto the yarn make a slip knot very close to the bead chain 10 pull the last loop through to end off thread the yarn back through the bead tie off on the inside of the tree weave the ends to the inside tie and leave short tails they won t show weave in the remaining white tail all done p s you are welcome to sell items created from this pattern just please don t sell the pattern thanks color happy handmades © 2022 p ag e | 3
